title: Project-Based Training Program for Strengthening Healthcare Educator Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational expertise in healthcare and educational experience
context.additional_context: Customized training programs for medical industry professionals conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately apply structured teaching methods (5+ steps) in medical education design with over 80% accuracy.
Learners develop 3+ types of field-applicable assessment tools and achieve peer feedback scores of 4.0/5.0 or higher.
Learners integrate and implement 4+ learner motivation strategies into project deliverables.
Learners improve their educational confidence index (5-point scale) by 30% or more compared to baseline.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
